sources.description: NIH drug research and safety information

drug_information.title: Drug Information 2
content: Treating opioid addiction in jails improves treatment engagement, reduces overdose deaths and reincarcerationSeptember 10, 2025 —   NIH-funded study demonstrates life-saving potential of providing medications for opioid use disorder in carceral settings.
One dose of antibiotic treats early syphilis as well as three dosesSeptember 3, 2025 —   NIH-funded clinical trial shows potential to simplify treatment for early syphilis.
